RimForge.AlloyDef.label: make bronze
RimForge.AlloyDef.description: Make bronze, an alloy of copper and tin, that has been in use since ancient times. Makes for very good tools, weapons and armor, at the cost of beauty and construction time.

RimForge.AlloyDef.label: make bronze
RimForge.AlloyDef.description: Make adamantium, a complex alloy of Bronze, Staballoy and Gilded Plasteel. It is unbelievably strong, and can be sharpened to a razor's edge without risk of it fracturing. It's dark surface is strangely beautiful.
